entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
